data.title: Clean energy solutions
data.meta_description: Learn how PG&E delivers low-emission energy to customers with our clean energy solutions.
data.text:
PG&E is proud to deliver some of the nation's cleanest electric power. In 2022, nearly 40% of our customers’ electricity came from renewable resources including biopower, geothermal, small hydroelectric, solar and wind power. Overall, 95% of our customers’ electricity came from greenhouse gas (GHG)-free resources, including renewables, nuclear and large hydroelectric power.

Understanding our energy sources

The power mix delivered to PG&E’s bundled-service customers in 2022 included the following greenhouse gas-free technologies:

Eligible renewable resources, such as wind, geothermal, biomass, solar and small hydro (38%)

Non-emitting nuclear generation (49%)

Large hydroelectric facilities (8%)
